2021-01-15.message_en: Expecting snow? Due to the current cold snap in northern England and Scotland, deliveries may arrive later than planned

2021-01-16.message_en: Expecting snow? Due to the current cold snap in northern England and Scotland, deliveries may arrive later than planned

2021-02-16.message_en: Expecting snow? Due to this cold snap, we recommend choosing delivery one day earlier than normal if possible, in case of courier delays

2021-03-15.message_en: Need it for the weekend? This date is a Monday. Choose an earlier delivery date or different bouquet for weekend delivery

2021-04-01.message_en: Because of the bank holiday, deliveries that don't arrive on Thu can't be re-delivered until Saturday. We recommended upgrading to Premium Delivery or choosing Wed delivery to avoid this.

2020-04-11.message_en: Because of the bank holiday, delivery is only available with Premium Delivery.

2020-03-20.message_en: Ordering for Mother's Day? We recommend choosing Thu 19th for delivery in time for Mother's Day

2020-02-14.message_en: The delivery can arrive any time up to 5pm and there's a small chance it'll arrive on Saturday. Want it with them earlier? Choose delivery on 13th.
2020-02-14.message_fr: Le coursier peut livrer jusqu’à 18h le jour de la St Valentin mais il est possible que les fleurs arrivent le samedi. Vous préférez être prévoyant? Choisissez la livraison le 13 février.

2020-06-06.message_en: If your delivery is delayed, re-delivery attempted on Monday 8th June.
2020-06-06.message_fr: En cas de retard d’acheminement ou absence, le coursier se représentera le Lundi 8 Juin.

2020-03-01.message_en: Only available for certain cities. Delivery 9am-3pm, if delayed re-delivery attempted on Monday. Want it with them earlier? Choose delivery on Saturday 29th.
2020-03-01.message_fr: Disponible uniquement pour certaines villes. Livraison 9-15h, tout retard d'acheminement sera re-livré le Lundi 2. Vous préférez être prévoyant? Choisissez la livraison le Samedi 29.

2019-02-14.message_en: Delivery charges apply on 14 Feb to ensure delivery on Valentine's Day.
2019-02-14.message_de: Lieferung am 14. nur per GO Express, um eine Lieferung am Valentinstag bis 14 Uhr zu garantieren

2019-05-04.message_en: Express delivery charges apply to ensure delivery before Mother's Day.
2019-05-04.message_de: Zusatzkosten für den Express Versand um eine Lieferung vor dem Muttertag zu garantieren.

2020-12-22.message_en: Last delivery day for a free delivery before Christmas.
2020-12-22.message_de: Letzter Versandtag für eine garantierte kostenlose Lieferung vor Weihnachten.

2020-12-23.message_en: Guaranteed delivery attempt by 4pm. Please use the delivery information e.g. for a safe storage location.
2020-12-23.message_de: Garantierter Zustellversuch bis 16 Uhr, um eine Lieferung vor Weihnachten zu garantieren.

2020-05-09.message_en: Express delivery charges apply to ensure delivery before Mother's Day.
2020-05-09.message_de: Zusatzkosten für den Express Versand um eine Lieferung vor dem Muttertag zu garantieren.

2020-06-13.message_de:
Versand Donnerstag, keine garantierte Samstagslieferung. 
Für wichtige Anlässe empfehlen wie unseren Express-Service

Versand Donnerstag, keine garantierte Samstagslieferung.

2021-05-12.message_en: Last shipping day for a free delivery before Father's Day
2021-05-12.message_de: Letzte Lieferoption für eine garantierte Zustellung vor dem Vatertag

2021-05-08.message_en: Guaranteed delivery attempt before Mother's Day. Please use delivery instructions e.g. leave safe
2021-05-08.message_de: Kostenpflichtige Lieferung um eine Zustellung vor dem Muttertag-Sonntag garantieren zu können

2021-05-06.message_en: Last shipping day for a free delivery before Mother's Day
2021-05-06.message_de: Letzte kostenlose Lieferoption für eine garantierte Zustellung vor dem Muttertag

2020-02-14.message_en: Delivery charges may apply on 14 Feb to ensure delivery on Valentine's Day. View pricing at next step

2019-02-13.message_en: Ordering for Valentine's Day? We recommend upgrading to Premium Delivery (£5) for guaranteed delivery by 14th

2019-02-01.message_en: Expecting snow? Due to this cold snap, deliveries may arrive 1 day earlier or later than planned

2019-01-29.message_en: Expecting snow? Due to this cold snap, deliveries may arrive later than planned.
2019-01-29.message_fr: Des perturbations sont a prévoir cette semaine à cause de l'épisode neigeux.

2019-01-30.message_en: Expecting snow? Due to this cold snap, deliveries may arrive later than planned.

2019-11-02.message_en: Due to bank holiday, deliveries will be operating on a 2-day service.
2019-11-02.message_fr: Pour cause de jour férié, les livraisons se feront sur 2 jours.

2019-11-02.message_en: In states with the Reformationstag Bank Holiday the delivery will be expected on Friday.
2019-11-02.message_de: In Bundesländern mit Reformationstag findet die Lieferung vorraussichtlich Freitags statt.

2020-12-22.message_en: Last free delivery to guarantee delivery before Christmas
2020-12-22.message_de: Letzte kostenlose Zustellung, um eine Lieferung vor Weihnachten zu garantieren

2017-02-14.message_en: Delivery is available via Premium Delivery from £5.00 to guarantee delivery on Valentine's Day.

2016-10-21.message_en: Due to proposed Royal Mail industrial action, deliveries on Friday 20th and Saturday 21st October are only available via Premium Delivery.

2020-02-14.message_en: Your gift may arrive between 13th-15th Feb. Please tell us their phone number and any delivery instructions to help driver deliver on time.

hide_order_details_message_on.message: Special delivery on Mothering Sunday via DPD Weekend Courier (£6).
DPD costs £5.00. Next free delivery 28th March.

hide_shipping_method_description_message.message: DPD Courier arrives by 6pm on your selected day. DPD Morning arrives by midday.

Please note that Royal Mail is not a guaranteed service. Packages that do not not arrive on Thursday 13th April will not arrive until Saturday 15th April. We therefore recommend using DPD for guaranteed Thursday delivery.
